DOC.brief_title: Home Plate : A Trial Improve Home Food Preparation Practices Among Parents Toddlers
DOC.detailed_description: Barriers healthy eat active living heart obesity epidemic . This study focus key factor underlie healthy eating : home food preparation . This study aim test effectiveness community-based , peer-mentored intervention improve home food preparation practice family young child . The investigator partner community-based organization serve family child age 1 3 year West Philadelphia aim specifically : 1 . Test intervention 's effect diet physical health . Hypothesis 1 : The intervention group improve home food preparation practice healthier diet compare control group . 2 . Test intervention 's effect family health . Hypothesis 2 : The intervention group report improve parent skill hopeful pattern think . 3 . Identify factor present baseline engagement intervention distinguish intervention participant improve diet , physical health , family health .
DOC.criteria: mentees 1 . Englishspeaking 2 . Able give inform consent . 3 . Legal guardian caregiver least one child , age 13 year child 1 . 13 year old child mentee primary caregiver enrol study 2 . If mentee caregiver one child , eligible child ( age 13 year ) enrol study . peer mentor 1 . Eligible peer mentor meet inclusion criterion set forth mentees . ( Children peer mentor eligible study . ) In addition , 2 . The study team decide participant invite peer mentor , base attribute include interest , leadership ability , home food preparation skill . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Caregivers child meet inclusion criterion . 2 . Caregivers pregnant time enrollment . 3 . Caregivers child medical condition significantly affect diet eating habit . ( The study team ask time recruitment subject child medical condition significantly affect diet eating habit . ) 4 .
